nushi_hikou_0020_system_01: The Titan Bombirdier began eating something...

to\r
the\r
Titan\r
somehow, huh?[VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_hikou_0020_friend_02:
So that’s the Open Sky Titan... Wait, is this Titan
what’s been dropping all those boulders?!\c

some kinda mystical Meal Power or something.[VAR 0114(0006)]
nushi_hikou_0020_friend_05: So we’d better be ready to go all out![VAR 0114(0006)]
